meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spatial.
meanings.sent1: The spatialities of the map helped us understand the geography better.
meanings.sent2: The architect considered the spatialities of the building before designing it.
meanings.sent3: The spatialities of the puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: She explored the spatialities of her imagination, creating vivid worlds.
meanings.sent5: The spatialities of the room were enhanced by the colorful decorations.

meanings.definition: The spatial properties, relations, or elements of something.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the spatialities of the stars to understand their positions in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The urban planner analyzed the spatialities of the city to improve traffic flow.
meanings.sent3: The spatialities of the jigsaw puzzle pieces made it tricky to fit them together.
meanings.sent4: The artist played with the spatialities of light and shadow in her painting.
meanings.sent5: The spatialities of the garden were carefully planned to create a harmonious layout.
